title: Advances in Laboratory Medicine / Avances en Medicina de Laboratorio Volume 3 Issue 1
author: For Authors
description: Volume 3, issue 1 of the journal Advances in Laboratory Medicine / Avances en Medicina de Laboratorio was published in 2022.
cleaned_text: Abstract Objectives We evaluated the prevalence of season, of January 1 and December 31, 2018, as registered in the database of the laboratory information system. Major 48%. Prevalence was greater in males than in females (53% vs. 46%). By age group, deficiency was more prevalent in quartile 1 was greater in spring (nonsignificant differences with respect to winter) and lower in summer. The association between 25-(OH)D and PTH was assessed in include female sex (OR, 1.27), OR 1.63, spring OR 1.16), and age (quartile 1, OR, 3). Conclusions The prevalence 25-(OH)D deficiency differed according to sex, and year. Furthermore, elevation of PTH is mainly influenced by low 25-(OH)D, female sex, season, and age.
